resources.string:
1. Thoroughly shuffle the card deck
2. Divide chips evenly between individuals/groups of players
3. Each player/group-Choose one category from music/sounds and one from pictures
4. Each player/group-Take2 decision cards-One for betting a wrong answer and one for betting a right answer.
5. Each player/group is responsible for their own chip count.
6. Each player/group-Ante $25.00 Chip
7. Pick a card from the card deck first. Follow the instructions on the card and choose a category to begin.
KE ABOUT 30 SECONDS TO GUESS OR PLAY FOR ADDITIONAL 11 SECOND
You have no internet connection!\nPlease connect to internet.
